00059 #define TRANS_EVERY_N_SYNC(n) (n) /*n = 1 to 240 */
00060 #define TRANS_SYNC_ACYCLIC    0    /* Trans after reception of n SYNC. n = 1 to 240 */
00061 #define TRANS_SYNC_MIN        1    /* Trans after reception of n SYNC. n = 1 to 240 */
00062 #define TRANS_SYNC_MAX        240  /* Trans after reception of n SYNC. n = 1 to 240 */

00064 #define TRANS_RTR             253  /* Transmission on request */

00066 #define TRANS_EVENT_PROFILE   255  /* Transmission on event */
